attributes.action: immediately declare a 90-day moratorium on home repossessions & distressed debt payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst the PM’s bank bail-out money seems to be taking its own time to percolate down to help the ordinary people, we are losing jobs and homes as we speak  --  inflicting permanent damages to our social psyche. 

So, whilst morally/politically pursuing the banks, the PM should also do what's in his power and should, on humanitarian  grounds, immediately declare a 90-day moratorium on home repossessions & distressed debt payments by households and small businesses.
